meta.title: The Old Crown Girton - Nepalese & British Cuisine
meta.description: Historic thatched pub in Girton combining authentic Nepalese cuisine with British pub classics

aboutSection.title: Welcome to Old Crown
description: Girton's historic thatched pub just outside Cambridge – blending community heritage with a warmly spiced Nepalese kitchen and familiar British pub comfort.
Garden space for long summer evenings, cosy interior for winter gatherings, and a welcoming spot for locals, families, students, professionals & visitors.
Our dual identity means you can explore aromatic Himalayan-inspired dishes while friends opt for classic favourites – shared tables, shared experiences.

features.title: Why Guests Visit
items: Close to Girton College / north Cambridge

menuHighlights.title: Our Signature Dishes
menuHighlights.subtitle: A taste of what we offer

featuredDishes.title: Crispy Hot Wings
featuredDishes.description: Spiced grilled chicken wings with our signature marinade

featuredDishes.title: Himali Lamb
featuredDishes.description: Green curry seasoned with Himalayan salt and yoghurt blend with fresh mint, green chilli and Nepalese spice

featuredDishes.title: Khasi Ko Masu (Goat Curry)
featuredDishes.description: A rich and flavoursome slow cooked goat on the bone/off the bone with unique blend of Nepalese spices

featuredDishes.title: Chicken Bhuna
featuredDishes.description: Traditional spiced curry with tender chicken pieces in a rich, thick sauce

featuredDishes.title: Chicken Curry
featuredDishes.description: Classic home-style curry with tender chicken in aromatic spices

featuredDishes.title: Vindaloo
featuredDishes.description: Fiery hot curry with potatoes in a tangy, spiced sauce - for the brave!
